Articles.Content:
This is a simple little container mod I started working on today. It's meant to be mod-friendly, so anyone who wants to use it for their mod and change the artwork will be able to do that easily.

Download:

http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/220203-vts-versatile-toolbox-system

http://www.nexusmods.com/kerbalspaceprogram/mods/3/?

Goo container for scale

VTS MMU

Mounting Rack, 1.25m

Mounting Rack, 1.875m

Features

- opens, includes interior surfaces & colliders

- mod-friendly, create your own art for it, make it hold anything!

- support for KAS features

- addition support parts for attachment, exta parts with the same shape

- Flags!

Is it like Flexrack?

It's not as feature heavy as flexrack, but there was a part I wanted to make for the flexrack standard when it's released, and I decided to try it now after seeing the toolbox requested.

Edited June 3, 2014 by Nazari1382

*drools a waterfall that drowns nearby cat*

Oh My God, Its Finally Been Made...

that looks suspiciously like Clara's tool box also love the look although the textures look a bit bright for me. Maybe darken the textures a small bit and if you can do so add some burn marks to make it more kerbaly...

but overall it looks amazing and i hope this will go far
Amazing! Great Work Nazari!
Love it!

Jeb:Hey bill can you give me that wrench?

Bill:Shure.... pssshhhh.

Jeb:I meant from the toolbox you jackass!.
FAR-shielding compatible?
This is awesome. Exactly what I was asking from in a mod request thread a while back.
hmm, that looks interesting
The more I look at it, the weird shaded letters of VTS look out of place. Have you tried out other styles?
Glad this will be ready for the part failure mods in dev, along with... KAStools? Hopefully?

The more I look at it, the weird shaded letters of VTS look out of place. Have you tried out other styles?

No, but it's easy to open up the image replace it.

Glad this will be ready for the part failure mods in dev, along with... KAStools? Hopefully?

It'll be ready for whatever people want to use it for, I'm just going to add a couple extra things first...
Download link! Download link!

Download link! Download link!

I Agree with this statement
hmm this would actually make a cool prop if used as such

Introducing the VTS MMU

Due to a recent bulk purchase of RCS thruster components from the Orbitz Aerospace junkyard, Kerbal Materials Corporation was able to mass produce a highly nimble personal monopropellant vehicle, saving precious EVA fuel and fitting the VTS dimensions.

Nice! I like the personal EVA seat. Looks fun! I'd add some sort of solar panels, or a tiny generator that would power a gyro, or some forward facing lights. Keep up the great work!

Oh, and since you don't seem to know this, FLEXracks is officially dead. So if you're up for it, you could do something similar to what nothke had in mind!
I wants it!!!
Engineers inspecting the initial design of the standard 1.25m rack:
It's beautiful. *Sheds space tear*
These look great. Download?

Dang it jaw i am kerbal, not a surgeon so stop flying off...

but again awesome rack but can the mmu have like a small pack that contains Eva propellant?

The large VTS rack:

1 large rack/ 3 small racks happen to fit in the KSO cargo bay quite nicely. I need to fix a few visual problems and I should be able to have a download for it tonight.
It's already tonight for me and I don't want to have to wait till tomorrow afternoon to play with this.
yay i can't wait for this!

It's already tonight for me and I don't want to have to wait till tomorrow afternoon to play with this.
yay i can't wait for this!
